properties.description: Everyone from the community is welcome to come in, use our comfy couch area and get cozy. We've got a sharing library with books and board games, and there's always someone around to have a natter with.
properties.title: The Medan Centre

properties.description: Everyone from the community is welcome to come in, sit by the fire and get cozy. We've got a sharing library with books and board games, and there's always someone around to have a natter with. Drop in and enjoy our comfy sofa by the fire.
properties.title: The Medan Centre, Quarry Room
